You can apply the following filters to the map:
  • Gateway(s) - Select one to five gateways to filter devices by.
  • Link Quality - Link Quality is based on the Link Cost of the Primary Forward Neighbor. Categories are as follows:
    • Excellent - Link cost is between 1 and 2.
    • Average - Link cost is 3.
    • Below Average - Link cost is between 4 and 5.
    • Evaulating - Number of samples is less than 50.
  • Color Code By - Select how to color code the pins by. A legend will be displayed below the map.
    • By Gateway - Color code the pins by gateway so that each pin is color coded according to it's primary gateway.
    • By Link Quality - Color code the pins by Link Quality so that each pin is color coded according to the categories mentioned above.
    Click on the Filter button to filter the results.
    The resulting devices will display on the map with the total count of filtered devices.
    Click on the Gear Icon next to the device count to view options you can do for the filtered device collection (Collection Actions, Download data).
A maximum of 5 gateways may be selected.
No devices were found on the map with the provided Meter Number or Device Name.
